Explosion area radius {2}m
messages.1000093719:
#y[Magic Arrow]
#wRapid Shot's arrows are fired automatically and while they are in the air, continuous explosions occur to give damage several times. Enemies that received damage from Rapid Shot more than {0} times will only get {1}% of damage.
#yCritical resistance reduced by {2}%
Duration {3} sec
messages.1000095501: #y[Magic Arrow]\n#wSwift Shot's number of arrows is increased and additional attack can be dealt when Normal Attack button is entered.\n#yAdditional hit's ATK (Swift Shot's {0}%)
messages.1000097811:
#y[Magic Arrow]
#wTracking Arrows' number of arrows and the explosion area when hit accurately are increased. When all types of Magic Arrow hit enemies accurately with Critical hit, Fatal Tracking effect will be activated. When you get {0} Fatal Tracking effect, you can use Fatal Guided Shot with {1}% ATK for a while. Activation effect will not disappear even when Fatal Tracking Shot is used and cooldown of Fatal Tracking Arrows is recovered when it is activated.
#yTracking Arrows' ATK increased by {2}%
Fatal Tracking Arrows duration {3} sec
Fatal Tracking Arrows cooldown {4} sec
messages.1000078986: #y[Magic Arrow]\n#wDetonating Arrow can be shot {0} times continuously. However, damage will not be changed. After shooting the arrow, #yLeft Click#w to shoot another arrow.
messages.1000094746: When #y[Stunning Shot]#w is used, you will get {0} #y[Fatal Tracking]#w quickly.\n\n#yOwn ATK increases {1}%
messages.1000079292:
#y[Magic Arrow]
#wAttack power of Extension Arrow is increased, and the arrow pierces through enemies. The arrow explodes when it hits the ground and Extension Core will be created at the center of the explosion which allows Swift Shot to be launched. Only {0} Extension Cores can exist at a time.
#yExtension Arrow's arrow ATK: +{1}%
Extension Arrow's separated arrow ATK: +{2}%
Extension Core duration {3} sec

messages.1000079547: #y[Magic Arrow]\n#wSwift Shot's number of arrows is increased and additional attack can be dealt when Normal Attack button is entered. When used while retreating backwards, arrows will be fired from the Extension Core. Extension Core will not disappear even when the arrow is fired, and its duration will be refreshed. Additional attack cannot be dealt during this time.\n#yAdditional attack's ATK (Swift Shot's {0}%)
